plot: A high school senior really has the hots for her boyfriend and wants to get married right after she graduates, despite the objections of her parents.
title: Are You Ready for Marriage?
plot_es: A high school senior really has the hots for her boyfriend and wants to get married right after she graduates, despite the objections of her parents.
plot_en: A high school senior really has the hots for her boyfriend and wants to get married right after she graduates, despite the objections of her parents.
